page.title: 15INSKIP C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: This school is a CE Primary with 92 pupils aged between 4+ and 11+ years. There is a head, Deputy head, 2 full time teachers, a nursery assistant, a secretary and a cook, assistant cook and dinner lady as school dinners are cooked in school and all the children stay for dinner. There are 8 managers who meet once a term to discuss school matters,the chairman is the vicar.A staffroom,toilets and 2 classrooms have been added recently.The next project is the replacement of two junior classrooms and the hall.The children are taught in age groups There are 2 infant and 2 junior groups They all come together for morning assembly.The building is used for for other things such as Mothers Union Flower Arrangement club and the Funday.Altogether there are 43 girls and 49 boys.
